entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:53 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 2:59 PM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
